Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Players = game:GetService("Players") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
Movement = script:WaitForChild("Movement") Remover = script:WaitForChild("Remover")
Grips = { Equip = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1), Display = CFrame.new(3.5, 1.4, -1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) }
GremlinModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(180497645) Gremlin = GremlinModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() if GremlinModel and GremlinModel.Parent then GremlinModel:Destroy() end
ReloadTime = 10
Tool.Grip = Grips.Equip Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function DestroyGremlin() if GremlinDied then GremlinDied:disconnect() end if PlayerGremlin and PlayerGremlin.Parent then PlayerGremlin:Destroy() end Tool.Enabled = false wait(ReloadTime) Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function MakeGremlin() if PlayerGremlin and PlayerGremlin.Parent then PlayerGremlin:Destroy() end PlayerGremlin = Gremlin:Clone() GremlinDied = PlayerGremlin.Changed:connect(function(Property) if not PlayerGremlin.Parent then DestroyGremlin() end end) GremlinTorso = PlayerGremlin:FindFirstChild("Torso") GremlinTorso.CFrame = Torso.CFrame - Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (((GremlinTorso.Size.Z / 2) + (Torso.Size.Z / 2) + 0)) local MovementClone = Movement:Clone() MovementClone.Disabled = false MovementClone.Parent = PlayerGremlin local RemoverClone = Remover:Clone() local CreatorValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorValue.Name = "Creator" CreatorValue.Value = Player CreatorValue.Parent = PlayerGremlin local ToolValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") ToolValue.Name = "Tool" ToolValue.Value = Tool ToolValue.Parent = PlayerGremlin RemoverClone.Disabled = false RemoverClone.Parent = PlayerGremlin PlayerGremlin.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local TorsoPosition = (Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + (GremlinTorso.Size.Z / 2)) + 0)) TorsoPosition = (TorsoPosition - (TorsoPosition * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0)).lookVector * (Torso.Size.X * 1.5)) TorsoPosition = (TorsoPosition - Vector3.new(0, (Torso.Size.Y / 2), 0)) GremlinTorso.CFrame = TorsoPosition end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or (PlayerGremlin and PlayerGremlin.Parent) then return end Handle.Transparency = 1 MakeGremlin() end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end end
function Unequipped() end
Tool.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Tool.Parent:IsA("Backpack") and not Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) then if PlayerGremlin and PlayerGremlin.Parent then PlayerGremlin:Destroy() end Handle.Transparency = 0 DestroyGremlin() end end)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Creator = Model:FindFirstChild("Creator") Tool = Model:FindFirstChild("Tool")
function DestroyModel() Debris:AddItem(Model, 2) end
if not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Tool or not Tool.Value or not Tool.Value.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
ToolObject = Tool.Value Player = Creator.Value
if not Player or not Player:IsA("Player") then DestroyModel() return end
Character = Player.Character if not Character or not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then DestroyModel() return end
Humanoid.Died:connect(function() DestroyModel() end)
Player.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Character" then DestroyModel() end end)
ToolObject.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not ToolObject.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Figure = script.Parent Humanoid = Figure:WaitForChild("Humanoid") Torso = Figure:WaitForChild("Torso")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Animation = Figure:WaitForChild("Animation") Standing = Animation:WaitForChild("Standing")
Creator = Figure:WaitForChild("Creator")
if Creator.Value and Creator.Value.Parent and Creator.Value:IsA("Player") then CreatorPlayer = Creator.Value CreatorCharacter = CreatorPlayer.Character if CreatorCharacter then CreatorHumanoid = CreatorCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") CreatorTorso = CreatorCharacter:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") end end
if not CreatorPlayer or not CreatorCharacter or not CreatorHumanoid or not CreatorTorso then Creator = nil else Creator = { Player = CreatorPlayer, Character = CreatorCharacter, Humanoid = CreatorHumanoid, Torso = CreatorTorso } end
ScreamScript = script:WaitForChild("ScreamScript")
Motors = {}
FollowingPath = false WalkRadius = 25
FollowRadius = 25 MaxDistanceFromTarget = 50 MaxDistanceFromCreator = 50
TargetPlayer = nil ScareSuccess = false
Humanoid.Health = Humanoid.MaxHealth
for i, v in pairs(Torso:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Motor6D") then table.insert(Motors, {Parent = v.Parent, Name = v.Name, Part0 = v.Part0, Part1 = v.Part1, C0 = v.C0, C1 = v.C1}) end end
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function MoveAround(TargetPoint) TargetPoint = ((not TargetPoint and (Torso.Position + Vector3.new(math.random(-WalkRadius, WalkRadius), 0, math.random(-WalkRadius, WalkRadius))) or TargetPoint)) Humanoid:MoveTo(TargetPoint) end
function SecureJump() if Humanoid.Jump then return end local TargetPoint = Humanoid.TargetPoint local Blockage, BlockagePos = RayCast((Torso.CFrame + CFrame.new(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(TargetPoint.X, Torso.Position.Y, TargetPoint.Z)).lookVector * (Torso.Size.Z / 2)).p, Torso.CFrame.lookVector, (Torso.Size.Z * 2.5), {Figure, (((Creator and Creator.Character) and Creator.Character) or nil)}) if not Humanoid.Jump and (Blockage and not Blockage.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")) then Humanoid.Jump = true end end
function GetClosestPossiblePlayer() local ClosestPlayer = nil local PlayersNearby = {} for i, v in pairs(Players:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Player") and v ~= Creator.Player and v.Character then local character = v.Character local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and torso and not character:FindFirstChild(ScreamScript.Name) then local ToolsFound = {} for i, v in pairs(character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Tool") and v.CanBeDropped and v:FindFirstChild("Handle") then table.insert(ToolsFound, v) end end if #ToolsFound > 0 then local DistanceApart = (torso.Position - Torso.Position).magnitude if DistanceApart <= FollowRadius then table.insert(PlayersNearby, {Player = v, Distance = DistanceApart, Tools = ToolsFound}) end end end end end if #PlayersNearby > 0 then table.sort(PlayersNearby, (function(Player1, Player2) return Player1.Distance < Player2.Distance end)) local ClosestPlayersNearby = {} for i, v in pairs(PlayersNearby) do if v.Distance <= PlayersNearby[1].Distance then table.insert(ClosestPlayersNearby, v) end end ClosestPlayer = ClosestPlayersNearby[math.random(1, #ClosestPlayersNearby)] end return ClosestPlayer end
function ScareTarget() Standing.Value = true pcall(function() if not TargetPlayer or not TargetPlayer.Player.Parent or not TargetPlayer.Character.Parent or not TargetPlayer.Humanoid.Parent or TargetPlayer.Humanoid.Health == 0 or not TargetPlayer.Torso.Parent or not TargetPlayer.Tools then return end SetVertexColor(Vector3.new(255, 0, 0)) Torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(TargetPlayer.Torso.Position.X, Torso.Position.Y, TargetPlayer.Torso.Position.Z)) ScreamScriptClone = ScreamScript:Clone() ScreamScriptClone.Disabled = false ScreamScriptClone.Parent = TargetPlayer.Character local DropRadius = 10 if #TargetPlayer.Tools > 0 then for i, v in pairs(TargetPlayer.Tools) do if v:IsA("Tool") then local handle = v:FindFirstChild("Handle") if handle then v.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") handle.CFrame = TargetPlayer.Torso.CFrame + Vector3.new(math.random(-DropRadius, DropRadius), math.random(-0, (DropRadius / 2)), math.random(-DropRadius, DropRadius)) end end end end end) ScareSuccess = true TargetPlayer = nil wait(2) if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 then SetVertexColor(Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)) Standing.Value = false end end
for i, v in pairs(Figure:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not ScareSuccess and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and humanoid ~= Humanoid and TargetPlayer and TargetPlayer.Character and TargetPlayer.Character == Hit.Parent then ScareTarget() end end) end end
function SetVertexColor(Color) for i, v in pairs(Figure:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then for ii, vv in pairs(v:GetChildren()) do if vv:IsA("DataModelMesh") then vv.VertexColor = Color end end end end end
Humanoid.Died:connect(function() SetVertexColor(Vector3.new(255, 0, 0)) if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(Figure:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v.CanCollide = true end end for i, v in pairs(Motors) do local Motor = Instance.new("Motor6D") Motor.Name = v.Name Motor.Part0 = v.Part0 Motor.Part1 = v.Part1 Motor.C0 = v.C0 Motor.C1 = v.C1 Motor.Parent = v.Parent end Debris:AddItem(Figure, 3) end)
repeat Spawn(function() if not TargetPlayer and not ScareSuccess then local ClosestPlayerInfo = GetClosestPossiblePlayer() if ClosestPlayerInfo then local ClosestPlayer = ClosestPlayerInfo.Player local PlayerCharacter = ClosestPlayer.Character local PlayerHumanoid = nil local PlayerTorso = nil if PlayerCharacter then PlayerHumanoid = PlayerCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") PlayerTorso = PlayerCharacter:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") end if PlayerHumanoid and PlayerHumanoid.Health > 0 and PlayerTorso then TargetPlayer = { Player = ClosestPlayer, Character = PlayerCharacter, Humanoid = PlayerHumanoid, Torso = PlayerTorso, Tools = ClosestPlayerInfo.Tools } end end end if not TargetPlayer or ScareSuccess then local TorsoPosition = nil if Creator and Creator.Character.Parent and Creator.Humanoid.Parent and Creator.Humanoid.Health > 0 and Creator.Torso.Parent then TorsoPosition = (Creator.Torso.CFrame + Creator.Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (((Creator.Torso.Size.Z / 2) + (Torso.Size.Z / 2)) + 0)) TorsoPosition = (TorsoPosition - (TorsoPosition * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0)).lookVector * (Creator.Torso.Size.X * 1.5)) TorsoPosition = (TorsoPosition - Vector3.new(0, (Creator.Torso.Size.Y / 2), 0)).p if ScareSuccess and (Torso.Position - Creator.Torso.Position).magnitude <= 6 then ScareSuccess = false end end MoveAround((TorsoPosition and TorsoPosition) or nil) else local DistanceFromTarget = nil local DistanceFromCreator = nil if TargetPlayer and TargetPlayer.Character.Parent and TargetPlayer.Humanoid.Parent and TargetPlayer.Humanoid.Health > 0 and TargetPlayer.Torso.Parent and Creator and Creator.Character.Parent and Creator.Humanoid.Parent and Creator.Humanoid.Health > 0 and Creator.Torso.Parent then DistanceFromTarget = (Torso.Position - TargetPlayer.Torso.Position).magnitude DistanceFromCreator = (Torso.Position - Creator.Torso.Position).magnitude local TargetTools = {} for i, v in pairs(TargetPlayer.Tools) do if v and v.Parent then table.insert(TargetTools, v) end end if #TargetTools > 0 and DistanceFromTarget <= MaxDistanceFromTarget and DistanceFromCreator <= MaxDistanceFromCreator then MoveAround((TargetPlayer.Torso.CFrame - CFrame.new(Torso.Position, TargetPlayer.Torso.Position).lookVector * 1).p) else ScareSuccess = true TargetPlayer = nil end else ScareSuccess = true TargetPlayer = nil end end end) SecureJump() wait(0.25) until false

--Made by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
ScareScript = script:WaitForChild("ScareScript")
Faces = {147144644, 117522793, 34186804, 30395097, 30265169, 21755022, 21635583, 20909103, 17138027, 14812981, 14127194, 7699177}
function DestroyScript() if ScareScriptClone and ScareScriptClone.Parent then Debris:AddItem(ScareScriptClone, 2) end Debris:AddItem(script, 2) end
if not Humanoid then DestroyScript() return end
ScareScriptClone = ScareScript:Clone() ScareScriptClone.Disabled = false
RemoteConnection = Instance.new("RemoteFunction") RemoteConnection.Name = "RemoteConnection" RemoteConnection.Parent = ScareScriptClone
RemoteConnection.OnServerInvoke = (function(Player, Mode, Value) if Mode == "Destroy" and Value then if Face and Face.Parent then Face.Texture = OriginalTexture end DestroyScript() end end)
ScareScriptClone.Parent = Character
if Head then Face = Head:FindFirstChild("face") OriginalTexture = Face.Texture local NewTexture = InsertService:LoadAsset(Faces[math.random(1, #Faces)]):GetChildren()[1].Texture Face.Texture = NewTexture else DestroyScript() end
Delay(15, function() DestroyScript() end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Animations = { Scream = {Animation = script:WaitForChild("Scream"), FadeTime = 1, Weight = 1, Speed = 5, Duration = 5}, Frightened = {Animation = script:WaitForChild("Frightened"), FadeTime = 1, Weight = 1, Speed = 0.5, Duration = 5}, }
RemoteConnection = script:FindFirstChild("RemoteConnection")
function DestroyScript() pcall(function() RemoteConnection:InvokeServer("Destroy", true) end) Debris:AddItem(script, 2) end
if not Humanoid or not RemoteConnection then DestroyScript() return end
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 for i, v in pairs(Animations) do AnimTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(v.Animation) if AnimTrack then AnimTrack:Play(v.FadeTime, v.Weight, v.Speed) end wait(v.Duration) if AnimTrack then AnimTrack:Stop() end end Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
DestroyScript()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(UpdateIcon) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)
